m_szDocTitle: WBCSD - World Business Council for Sustainable Development
m_szDocSumamry: Newsroom Business to partner with governments for the diffusion of game-changing low-carbon technology Geneva, December 12, 2014 - Business will work with governments to shape a novel technology and solutions agenda to support efforts for an ambitious climate agreement in Paris next year. In December 2015, a new global climate agreement will be brokered at the Paris Climate Change Conference (COP21). This will mark a key moment to shape the post-2020 climate regime.
